org.eng.aisp.dataset

Class AbstractSoundReferenceSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eng.util.AbstractReferenceShuffleIterable<IReferencedSoundSpec,ISoundReferenceSet>
      • org.eng.aisp.dataset.AbstractSoundReferenceSet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<IReferencedSoundSpec>, ISoundReferenceSet, IDereferencer<String,IReferencedSoundSpec>, IItemReferenceIterable<IReferencedSoundSpec>, IShuffleIterable<IReferencedSoundSpec>, ISizedIterable<IReferencedSoundSpec>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MetaData

    public abstract class AbstractSoundReferenceSet
extends AbstractReferenceShuffleIterable<IReferencedSoundSpec,ISoundReferenceSet>
implements ISoundReferenceSet
    Holds labeling, tags and other metadata on a set of reference sounds.
    Author:
    dawood

      • getTags

        public Properties getTags(String reference)
        Get the tags for the reference in this instance. The given reference is used first as the key and if not found, we use the absolute path and then the base name to look up the labels in this instance..
        Parameters:
        reference -
        Returns:
        null if not found or none set for the reference (this is different than labels).

      • split

        public List<ISoundReferenceSet> split(String labelName,
                                      int numberOfFolds)
        A convenience on split(String, int, int) with a fix seed so folds are easily repeatable.

      • split

        protected List<ISoundReferenceSet> split(String labelName,
                                         int numberOfFolds,
                                         int seed)
        Break this instance into the number of requested folds based on the contained label values for the given label. Each fold will have the same number of sounds (+/- 1) for each label value found for the given label name. The instances records are effectively shuffled according to the seed in order to randomly place sounds across the returned instances. The returned instances are disjoint and refer to the references. Records without the given label name will not be included in the output.
        Parameters:
        labelName -
        numberOfFolds -
        seed - seed used for the shuffle operation.
        Returns:
        the number of requested folds.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if each label value present does not have at least numberOfFolds records.
